data.lyric:
[ti:光点]
[ar:肖战]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]光点 - 肖战
[00:01.45]词：Rik Annema / Leroy Sanchez / Wynne Bennett
[00:02.91]曲：Rik Annema / Leroy Sanchez / Wynne Bennett
[00:04.37]中文词：NANA
[00:05.83]制作人：Wynne Bennett / The Anteloops
[00:07.29]混音：The Anteloops
[00:08.74]母带：The Anteloops
[00:10.20]监制：Luffy / Wayne
[00:11.66]相信自己的直觉
[00:14.90]从未曾改变
[00:17.45]最初的那张脸
[00:21.85]经历多少次更迭
[00:25.07]太多无法预言
[00:27.65]安静跨越
[00:30.52]迎接未来不管多遥远
[00:33.03]用特写放大着每一天
[00:35.59]每一刻都要燃烧沸点
[00:40.09]That we've got one life one world
[00:45.82]So let's come together
[00:48.43]We'll weather the storm
[00:50.37]A rain of colors Look up to the sky
[00:56.03]We're all made of shooting stars
[01:00.46]We are made to love WOO OH
[01:05.84]We are made to love WOO OH
[01:10.99]We are made to love WOO OH
[01:16.14]We are made to love
[01:18.38]We are made to love
[01:21.57]散落着的彩笔 空白的画面
[01:24.44]依旧在那边
[01:26.02]Then I would
[01:28.60]Oh yes I would
[01:31.76]用笔描绘现实与回忆的关联
[01:36.22]Then I would
[01:38.52]Trust me I would
[01:42.02]有过超越极限的瞬间
[01:44.78]经历过自己的改变
[01:47.10]走过的痕迹变成光点
[01:51.61]That we've got one life one world
[01:57.34]So let's come together
[01:59.94]We'll weather the storm
[02:01.95]A rain of colors Look up to the sky
[02:07.59]We're all made of shooting stars
[02:12.00]We are made to love WOO OH
[02:17.19]We are made to love WOO OH
[02:22.39]We are made to love WOO OH
[02:27.30]We are made to love
[02:29.97]We are made to love
[02:33.73]生命 渺小不可思议
[02:36.23]生活 绝不轻易放弃
[02:38.78]眺望 做最真的自己 OH YEAH
[02:43.92]明天 无论是雨或晴
[02:46.53]拥抱 让爱更有意义
[02:49.01]世界 带着爱去前进 OH
[02:53.06]Cause we've got one life one world
[02:58.61]So let's come together
[03:01.19]We'll weather the storm
[03:03.18]A rain of colors Look up to the sky
[03:08.84]We're all made of shooting stars
[03:13.17]We are made to love WOO OH
[03:18.45]We are made to love WOO OH
[03:23.59]We are made to love WOO OH
[03:28.78]We are made to love
[03:31.18]We are made to love
[03:33.78]We are made to love
